parameters.description:
The identifier for the call provided in the

parameters.name: call_id

schema.description:
Parameters required to transfer a SIP call to a new destination using the
Realtime API.

target_uri.description:
URI that should appear in the SIP Refer-To header. Supports values like
`tel:+14155550123` or `sip:agent@example.com`.

schema.title: Realtime call refer request

requestBody.description: Destination URI for the REFER request.

summary: Transfer an active SIP call to a new destination using the SIP REFER verb.
